extendedInfo.description: Enjoy your life (Application)Darussalam publishers and distributors brings to you the best selling book in a digital form. Now you can read this wonderful compilation on your Android phone by simply downloading. It has a very attractive design and icons. It gives you the freedom to: Do search subjectively as well as objectively. Make your notes from any chapter also enabling you to go from page 1 to page 100 directly by simply dragging your finger over the screen. Mark the chapters as read and unreadKnow the meaning of a selected wordsRead the book in night mode having no strain on your eyesightDownload this application and learn how To make yourself adored by everyone around youTo adopt the most attractive ways of communicationTo start enjoying the life by developing your character and inter personal skillsTo teach your children the golden principle of a successful lifeTo shad off your fears and complexesTo adhere and stick yourself with the beautiful flowers of faith and confidenceWe (Darussalam Publishers and Distributors) would like to thank D-Tech Systems Ltd in abundance for researching, designing and developing the entire idea and application. D-Tech Systems is a sister concern of Darussalam. In coordination and collaboration with D-Tech systems we are planning to develop more intriguing and fascinating applications in times to come.

reviews.title: Great Book
reviews.comment: I have read its preface and compelled to  read it completely.a must read book for everyone
reviews.author: Imran Anjum

reviews.title: Very good
reviews.comment: Practical solutions for problems of today\'s life. Well done Darussalam.  Please make the application movable to SD card.
reviews.author: Zubair A

reviews.title: May Allah give you reward
reviews.comment: Jazak Allahu khair jazak  Great job done by darussalam we are waiting for your apps
reviews.author: Mohammad Ghufran Ansari

reviews.title: Must read to enjoy life !!!
reviews.comment: Beautifully organized ... Must read to organize your life and have a relief ... Good work dar us salam
reviews.author: Muzaffar Khan

reviews.title: Nice App
reviews.comment: Very enlightening and informative App. Would give 5 stars if you make the page horizontally scrollable. Thanks and keep up this great work.
reviews.author: Rai Ali

reviews.title: Good App of a Good Book
reviews.comment: Its good to see Darussalam Publishers on Android App Store. I have installed the app. Its good, smooth. It will be more awsome if you make zoom available.
reviews.author: Pips Papa

reviews.title: Very informative book
reviews.comment: I have read few chapters of the book and found them very informative and interesting. Most of all book is easy to read and have clear text.
reviews.author: Hasan Ali

reviews.title: Pretty crisp
reviews.comment: Just installed and went through a few pages ... the overall design is excellent and the app looks promising..
reviews.author: Abid Sultan
